gold.user: User with admin privileges who wants to remove associations between custom fields and issue types in Jira to streamline the issue creation process.
gold.ideal: Successfully removes the specified associations between the custom field and the issue types.

gold.user: Project manager looking to associate a new custom field with specific issue types in Jira to ensure that relevant data is captured during issue creation.
gold.ideal: Successfully creates associations between the custom field and the specified issue types.
